H0.text: What country became democratic after the death of Generalísimo Franco. Portugal

H1.text: What country became democratic after the death of Generalísimo Franco. Greece

H2.text: What country became democratic after the death of Generalísimo Franco. Argentina

H3.text: What country became democratic after the death of Generalísimo Franco. SPAIN

A4.text: The democratic transition began two days after the death of Francisco Franco, in November 1975.

A5.text: The transition concluded after the landslide victory of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party in the 1982 general election and the first peaceful transfer of executive power.
